description:
Section 73 application to vary the wording of condition 26 (car parking spaces, including disabled parking spaces, within the north-eastern building shown on drawings 1593-5-P-00-0011 and 1593-5-P-000-0012 hereby approved shall be laid out in accordance with that plan and also appropriately line-marked prior to occupation of the north east building.  The disabled parking spaces shall be kept available for the parking of vehicles for disabled persons at all times.)  of planning permission P102364 dated 23 March 2012 to allow the continued existing temporary arrangement of providing the displaced disabled car parking at the Emirates Stadium until 2015 when all three towers (C, D and E) of the north-eastern building shall have been completed.  

The proposed new wording for condition 26 is:

"The car parking spaces (including disabled parking spaces) within the north-eastern building shown on drawings 1593-5-P-000-0011 and 1593-5-P-000-0012 hereby approved shall be laid out in accordance with that plan and also appropriately line-marked prior to the occupation of Tower E of the north-eastern building.  The disabled parking spaces shall be kept available for the parking of vehicles for disabled persons at all times."
